remarks: Division into a reciprocal.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divap0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A # 0 ) $.
divap0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
recdivap2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1 / A ) / B ) = ( 1 / ( A x. B ) ) ) $.
